owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.paymentToken: The payment token address (address(0) for ETH)
The payment token address (address(0) for ETH)

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.showId: The unique identifier of the show

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

params.paymentToken: The payment token address (address(0) for ETH)

calculateTotalPayoutAmount(bytes32,addre.notice: Calculates the total amount available for payout for a show

clearVault(bytes32,address).notice: Clears the vault for a specific show, resetting stored values to zero

depositToVault(bytes32).notice: Deposits ether into the vault for a specified show

depositToVaultERC20(bytes32,uint256,addr.notice: Deposits ERC20 tokens into the vault for a specified show

distributeShares(bytes32,address[],uint2.notice: Distributes the total available payout among participants of a show based on predefined splits

getShowPaymentToken(bytes32).notice: Gets the payment token for a specific show

initialize(address,address).notice: Initializes the contract with the Show contract and the Sellout Protocol Wallet

payout(bytes32,address).notice: Allows the organizer or artist to withdraw funds after a show has been completed

processRefund(bytes32,uint256,address,ad.notice: Processes a refund adjustment in the financial records of a show

setShowPaymentToken(bytes32,address).notice: Sets the payment token for a specific show

withdrawRefund(bytes32,address).notice: Allows a user to withdraw their refund for a specific show
